title: Confinement induced change of microemulsion phase structure in controlled pore glass (CPG) monoliths
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28272-28284
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04090B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Margarethe Dahl, Cedric J. Gommes, René Haverkamp, Kathleen Wood, Sylvain Prévost, Pierre Schröer, Tomáš Omasta, Tim Julian Stank, Thomas Hellweg, Stefan Wellert
We use small-angle neutron scattering (SANS) to investigate the structure and phase behavior of a complex fluid within meso- and macroporous matrices.
